ValidationRule.description: If gift status is gift recorded itÂ´s need necessary fill the fields Gift Description, Gift Value,Date Sent, Currency and Gift Recipients
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( $RecordType.Name = "Relocation", $RecordType.Name = "New Brand", $RecordType.Name = "ShopRefit", $RecordType.Name = "Contract Change", $RecordType.Name = "Exit" ), ISPICKVAL(Gift_Status__c, "Gift Recorded"),
OR( ISBLANK(Gift_Description__c), ISBLANK(Gift_Value__c), ISBLANK(Date_Sent__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Currency__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: It is necessary to fill in the mandatory fields Gift Description, Gift Value, Date Sent, Currency.
